formation: Gun Doubles (2x2), Y Flex Right, RB Weak Left

routes.L2: Slot (F) - Deep Over (Cross) at 18–22 yds to opposite hash
routes.R2: Y (TE) - 12-yd Dig (sit vs wall, run-through if open)

rationale: Dagger/Slot Cross vs two-high: the outside go pins the deep half while the slot deep over splits the safeties and the TE dig creates a high–low on the MIKE; the hook and swing control the flats to keep the corners honest. It’s 11 personnel and spread, matching Patriots personnel without triggering a heavier defensive adjustment.
